item.title: European markets slide almost 1% as Russia fears resurface; Nestle unveils major cost-cutting plan
item.description: European markets slid on Tuesday as concerns over Russia reared their head once again.

item.title: Putin issues warning to United States with new nuclear doctrine
item.description: The updated doctrine outlines the threats that would make Russia, the world's biggest nuclear power, contemplate using such weapons.

item.title: Germany's Thyssenkrupp pops 8% after narrowing net loss and booking $1 billion impairment charge
item.description: Thyssenkrupp on Tuesday reported a 1-billion-euro ($1 billion) impairment on its struggling steel division.
